content: round 63 1sc 1dec x 6 12 st round 64 1sc 1dec x 3 6 st cut off the yarn leaving a long tail add a bit more stuffing before closing the seam weave the yarn in front loops of the rest 6 stitches and pull tight to close the hole hide the tail 6 7 arms make two arms both exactly the same start with the brown yarn round 1 magic_ring ch1 doesn t count as a st 6sc in a ring 6 st round 2 increase x 6 12 st round 3 1sc 1inc x 6 18 st round 4 5sc 1inc x 3 21 st round 5 to 6 single_crochet in all 21 st 21 st round 7 decrease x 3 15sc 18 st change colour to green round 8 to 12 single_crochet in all 18 st around 18 st change colour to white round 13 7sc decrease x 2 16 st round 14 to 15 single_crochet around in all 16 st 16 st change colour to green round 16 to 17 single_crochet around in all 16 st 16 st round 18 6sc decrease x 2 14 st change colour to white round 19 to 23 single_crochet around in all 14 st 14 st change colour to green round 24 single_crochet around in all 14 st 14 st round 25 5sc decrease x 2 12 st stuff the arms with polyester stuffing flatten the edges and crochet 6sc through both layers fasten_off leaving a long yarn tail enough to sew arms to the body sew on the arms at the level of round 43 of the body that s the last green row of the jumper 7 8 ears make two both exactly the same work with brown yarn round 1 magic_ring ch1 doesn t count as a st 6sc in a ring 6 st round 2 increase x 6 12 st round 3 3sc 1inc x 3 15 st round 4 to 8 single_crochet in all 15 st 15 st fasten_off leaving a long yarn tail to sew ears to the head fold them when sewing to the head muzzle work with brown yarn round 1 magic_ring ch1 doesn t count as a st 6sc in a ring 6 st round 2 increase x 6 12 st round 3 1sc 1inc x 6 18 st round 4 5sc 1inc x 3 21 st round 5 to 6 single_crochet in all 21 st 21 st fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing embroider a nose using dark yarn or you can simply sew on a black button sew on the muzzle between the eyes just above the collar of the jumper 8 9 jumper ribbing collar attach green yarn to a front loop of the round 44 of the body that was the first round of the head round 1 ch3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in the next 29 st slip_stitch 30 st round 2 ch2 fpdc bpdc x 15 slip_stitch 30 st round 3 ch2 fpdc
